CustomField.formula: IF( OR( GPS__Latitude__s = 0 , GPS__Longitude__s = 0 ) , "Missing Coordinates", HYPERLINK("https://www.google.com/maps/search/"& TEXT(GPS__Latitude__s )&"+"& TEXT(GPS__Longitude__s) &"/@"& TEXT(GPS__Latitude__s )&","& TEXT(GPS__Longitude__s )&",350m/data=!3m1!1e3!", "View Coordinates in Google Map"))
CustomField.label: Map Link
